4.2.1.2.1.1. anti_alignment.preprocessing.InputHandler¶

4.2.1.2.1.1.1. Module Contents¶

4.2.1.2.1.1.1.1. Classes¶

InputHandler(pathnet, pathlog, logtype)

Class for Input Handler contains all methods necessary for the user to create an object of filtered traces
class anti_alignment.preprocessing.InputHandler.InputHandler(pathnet, pathlog, logtype)¶

Class for Input Handler contains all methods necessary for the user to create an object of filtered traces Instance Attributes:

pathnet: Petrinet path value of the InputHandler object pathlog: Log path of the InputHandler object logtype: CSV or IEEE type log InputHandler object

ieee_xes_loghandler(self)¶

Loads the XES type log from the path :return: The log

csv_loghandler(self)¶

Loads the CSV type log from the path :return: The log

petrinethandler(self)¶

Loads the pnml file from the path :return: The petrinet with its initial and final marking

filtering_traces(self)¶

Calculates the filtered traces which fits the model :return: The filtered traces in a list

petrinetcreator(self, places, transitions, arcs)¶
